mapper.insert: INSERT INTO takku_review ( user_id, product_id, rating, content, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productId}, #{rating}, #{content}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.nickname FROM takku_review r JOIN takku_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM takku_review WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT ROUND(AVG(r.rating), 2) FROM takku_review r JOIN takku_product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id JOIN takku_funding f ON f.product_id = p.product_id WHERE f.funding_id = #{fundingId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM takku_review r JOIN takku_product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id JOIN takku_funding f ON f.product_id = p.product_id WHERE f.funding_id = #{fundingId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM takku_review WHERE product_id = #{productId}
